text: læa meux phwk khea kratha sing chawcha na rangkeiyc phwk khea k klaw wa phwk rea di phbhen brrda brrphburusʹ khxng phwk rea khey kratha ma læa xallxh k thrng chı phwk rea hı kratha man dwy cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan mi thrng chı hı kratha sing chawcha na rangkeiyc dxk phwk than ca klaw hıray kæ xallxhˌ nı sing thi phwk cea miru kranan hrux
